explains: n. [基医] 起搏器；领跑者；标兵

sentences.en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.cn: 她在心脏出了严重问题后装上了心脏起搏器。

sentences.en: Then install Pacemaker and required packages
sentences.cn: 然后安装 Pacemaker 和必要的包

sentences.en: Add a dump command from the PaceMaker state chart.
sentences.cn: 向PaceMaker状态表添加一条转储命令。
